biotools.summary: The RASMOT-3D PRO web server performs systematic searches in 3D protein structures for a set of residues exhibiting a particular topology. Input is a PDB file for the motif of interest; output is an interactive list of protein structures exhibiting resides of similar topology.

bioschemas.name: RASMOT-3D PRO
bioschemas.summary: The RASMOT-3D PRO web server performs systematic searches in 3D protein structures for a set of residues exhibiting a particular topology. Input is a PDB file for the motif of interest; output is an interactive list of protein structures exhibiting resides of similar topology.
